name: Achtung die Kugel
description:
Achtung die Kugel A couch party action game for 2-4 players

Guide your kurve with skill and strategy to be the last one standing in this fast-paced game of kurves on a Kugel.

Achtung die Kugel is based on the classic computer game Achtung die Kurve from 1995 but instead of duking it out on a plane, Achtung die Kugel lets players kurve for glory on a sphere (Kugel).

:) Best played with controllers (:

If this game gains attention we will continue working on it.

Features that we plan to implement include:

  • pickups and power-ups
  • more maps
  • eye and ear candy
  • non-spherical maps
  • elimination mode

if you have any suggestions, we would like to hear them and we might implement them!

We would really appreciate it if you took yourself the time to give us some feedback on our game!
